name: The Casino Rumble (Fixed)
description:
This game is an homage to the era of silent films in the 1920s. You play as James, an ordinary gambler, as he checks out a new casino in his town!

ROLL THE DICE!! Click the button "Roll the Dice!", and the number you get, that many enemies spawn. You must get a Natural 20, or get to Round 20 to escape the casino!

==========================CONTROLS===========================

WASD/Arrow Keys | Movement

Left Mouse Button | Shoot / Press Buttons
